website_summaries.verdict: Even, consistent results make this a user favorite.
pros: Has a nice smell and doesn't streak
Consistency makes it easy to apply evenly
cons: A few users had an allergic reaction

customer_reviews.title: It is AUTHENTIC, do your homework ppl, GREAT lotion, no bronzers no orange, Natural accelerator
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical bc of the reviews of people stating it was not authentic, Do your homework, it is authentic! You can check online, the new bottles don’t have the Logo on the caps , how you can tell is the bottom of the bottle, useplastics.com is on the bottom and they make the bottles for Ed Hardy, which the one I just received from Amazon, I’m thrilled with the lotion and do your own research not everyone who writes a review knows what they talking about. Great AUTHENTIC product and great delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: Shielah S.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and knew that something was off when I opened it. After comparing it to my almost empty bottle, I realized that there was no Ed Hardy branding on the packaging. Nowhere on the bottle did it say Ed Hardy. Returned. If I could give it zero stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Breda Day

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED BOTTLES: READ!
customer_reviews.text: Hey all! I though this was important to share. The new Ed Hardy bottle for this lotion does not have the Ed Hardy emblem anymore as of 2019. The bottom should read USBPLASTICS.COM which is where it is manufactured from. You can look this up on edhardytanning.com or do other research online as well. A lot of people that don't know about it being updated think they are getting fake bottles because it doesn't have the Ed Hardy logo anymore, but that was discontinued. Great lotion and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: MorganF

customer_reviews.title: Deep, Dark Tan
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion! I’ve seen other reviews saying it’s not “authentic”. Whether it is or not, I do not know, but it doesn’t matter to me as this stuff works!!! I’ve been tanning in the salon for a month and I’m just sort of tan. After only one use of this stuff my tan has deepened intensely!! It’s that deep, dark, Hawaiian tan I’ve been craving. And the smell is fantastic. Light Coconut scent. I do NOT stink like a tanning booth after a tan. Able to go to work or out to dinner afterward without being self conscious of how I smell. And the lotion is velvety smooth, absorbs quickly, not greasy. This stuff is PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyJacks

customer_reviews.title: New Fav Worth Buying Again & Again
customer_reviews.text: I am an experienced tanner and have tried several lotions. I love that this has no added bronzers and the color is my own. I don't have to worry about any "staining" as with bronzers and it gives a nice sun-kissed glow.
customer_reviews.author: Lilaea

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give less. I spent a month researching which lotion to buy and I go ahead and buy this and it is a fake. The cap is wrong, the bottom shows it’s a fake, the description doesn’t even say what it is suppose to say. It’s a lotion but zero for skin color.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Joseph (Book Addicts Reviews)

customer_reviews.title: This lotion smells amazing and makes my skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: I get extremely tan without lotion but I know it’s healthier for your skin to use it so I finally bought this. I’ve used other lotions in the past but their smells turned me off. This lotion smells amazing and makes my skin so soft. I absolutely recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to have been used when received!
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was packaged well from a glance! However, when unscrewing the lid there was dried and matted lotion around the top, the actual part the lotion comes out of had smeared lotion. Pictures are mere secs after opening!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic product View Ed Hardy's website
customer_reviews.text: To everyone that is saying they got a fake product, you need to visit the Ed Hardy tanning lotion website. the new bottle is designed exactly as you received I will include a screenshot from the website directly that proves you received an accurate product. I myself was looking at the bottle and saying why would there not be anything on it that says it's Ed Hardy cuz that just seems weird but I went to the website and sure enough there is a picture of exactly what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: PINS AND NEEDLES
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake lotion. I used this in a tanning bed (level 1) for 10 minutes and had to get out because my skin felt like it was being poked with needles. I went home and went to bed. I woke up at 1 am with horrible prickling skin and itchy hands and ankles. This lasted for two days. I often do not write reviews but seriously DONT BUY. I wouldn’t risk buying and getting a fake lotion because it was one of the most painfully annoying thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse H

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have my own personal tanning bed that had been collecting dust in my basement. So I decided to give it a try again and I purchased this as an accelerator. I was at a convention over the weekend and was asked where I'd been to get so tanned. I said my tanning bed in my basement. Well worth the money. Getting ready to put in my 2nd purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my top two favorite tanning lotions EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this ten stars if I could. The only thing that would make it better is if it has a little bronzer in it but because it smells so good I don't even care. I wear it even when I'm not tanning because the fragrance is just fantastic. No after tanning bed smell either. Totally worth every penny I paid, and I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay, Khaleesi of Cats

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tanning lotion. I adore the smell and get lots of compliments after tanning. I didn't want a lotion with a bronzer since I tend to look orange. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Greene

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is coming from someone who does NOT tan easily... This stuff is ahhmazzing! I am not even kidding. I have a tan after just 2 weeks worth of use. The first week was my body getting adjusted to UV light again, so that was the itching and redness phase. 😳 But I will definitely be ordering more of this because it works. It smells wonderful and doesn’t have that funky after smell like other lotions I have used. It is very moisturizing and a little goes a long way. Don’t hesitate to try it. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Church

customer_reviews.title: Just A Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturizer and makes your skin feel super soft. But that’s not what the intent of this purchase was. I had read this is one of the top tanning bed lotions on google and low and behold it does not get you any tanner than just being in the bed without a lotion. Not sure what the product is for if not to increase your tan. Wouldn’t recommend this as there are far cheaper moisturizers on the market.
customer_reviews.author: mikesocial_pr

customer_reviews.title: Tatted & Safe
customer_reviews.text: So I had just started getting into indoor tanning and needed something to protect my multitude of tattoos. This stuff is fantastic. I looked for so long to find a tattoo protectant lotion without bronzers because I tan fairly easily and didn’t want to get super dark. This stuff protects my skin very well, smells like a vanilla coconut dream, and doesn’t cause any unevenness. I also haven’t noticed any fading in any of my tattoos which is great!
customer_reviews.author: CailyxKurai

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion!
customer_reviews.text: I order this after using snooki lotion for a long time; I wanted to try something new. This is the first lotion that I have used that made my skin smell like lotion after tanning! It wasn't as dark or think as other lotions, but I could definitely feel the moisturizers in it. I usually hate running errands or going places after tanning because of the smell, but with this lotion I can!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. The smell is amazing when applying and after tanning. It doesn't leave that weird burnt yucky smell after working out at the gym then tanning afterwards. This will be what I use from now on. Top-notch It does have coconut oil in it and it was hard to wipe clean at the tanning bed. I will definitely stand up to tan from now on. It tans well and overall I loed it.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Charm

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like a good product
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a good product. Can’t say if it accelerated any tan as I used it only once. It smells of such strong vanilla it was way too feminine for me. It has some serious staying power even though I showered I could still smell it the next day. It made my wife nauseated but on an up note my 3 year old loved it. I don’t want to smell like I rolled around in vanilla all day but other than this it seemed to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money saved
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and a quarter of the price of the stuff at the salon. Gives me a nice tinted bronze look and helps me tan faster in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryl C.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product from Darktans!!! Use Beauty 4 Less
customer_reviews.text: CRAP PRODUCT!!!! My sister and I both burned when using this for half our normal time and we usually max out the beds and NEVER burn. Second time I bought this because I loved it the first time and this time it was not the same product! The one we burnt with the seller was Darktans. However, the first bottle I ordered I received a good quality product from Beauty 4 Less
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Authentic, smells amazing, protects tattoos & gives deep bronze
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT FAKE!!! Look at the authentic bottle from ED HARDY website & it is the exact same bottle..... This smells absolutely amazing. I will not use any other tanning lotion. It is very moisturizing & gives you an awesome bronze color while protecting your tattoos. I have a lot of tatts so this is a must for me. I highly recommend this lotion & you will not regret buying it. It keeps me smelling yummy after I tan & not like burnt skin like some of my old tanning lotions that cost $77 or more..... Just buy it
customer_reviews.author: krystal moore

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion, it arrived busted and had leaked out everywhere! Amazon took care of me though!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lotion. I have purchased it several times. This lotion doesn’t have bronzers or anything that will turn you orange. It is very moisturizing and leaves my skin smooth as silk. I often use it as a moisturizer for my legs when I wear a skirt and am out running errands. It smells great too! SADLY, this particular order arrived broken and half of the lotion was all over the inside of the packaging. Amazon asked me to return it and they issued me a refund so I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Walk

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning lotion!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tanning lotion! Would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a legit tan and not some orange bronzer. By far my favorite tanning lotion and i even received it before the estimated arrival date. I am and will continue to buy this lotion for my tanning needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this item and some people weren't so sure it was really Ed Hardy. I don't know. I do know that it goes on nicely. Smells alright when putting on.... nothing fantastic. Don't think it is doing a lot for my tan but? hard to tell. My only complaint is that I reek when I leave the tanning bed. I don't buy it again for that reason. I know there is probably a rational reason for the odors after a tanning session... but this one seems worse.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha J. Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: love the smell love the feel.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this twice so far, so I don’t know how browning this is, but I will update. I’ve always browned up quite well all my life, but for some reason my legs have become resistant to tanning That’s why I got this. I love the scent and feel of the lotion this far. No issue with the change in branding, as the seller adequately indicates and described this. I’ve spent far more on lotions and this is definitely a good quality replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Crissie Trevino

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: NO SAFETY SEAL or EXP DATE ON PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE: NO SAFETY SEAL & NO EXPIRATION DATE on packaging. I am not willing to chance my life or health on something that may or may not be FAKE PRODUCT. In the U.S., Gov’t Safety Guidelines typically require safety sealing and expiration dates. Since neither were present, I did not trust this purchase and returned it unused. As such, this rating rates my purchase experience only and does not rate the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great smell but didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Just like a lot of the other reviews suggest, this doesn’t seem like a true quality lotion. It smells great and doesn’t have that weird tanning lotion smell, but it’s almost like a lotion gel consistency. My husband and I tried it out for three days at the tanning salon to get ready for an upcoming trip. His color never really changed that much until we decided to try out a lotion from the salon for $41. After one use he had a noticible difference in his tan. We got this one for $26 but it really wasn’t worth it. Two stars for the smell and how soft it made the skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Good scent, not great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this lotion! I’m always trying to new lotion to see what works best for me, and this one has done well! I know some people saw results after the first use, but it took me about a week or so. I only go three times a week for about 9 min each session so I’m not extremely dark. The smell is amazing, and the bottle is cute. Only thing for me, it doesn’t moisturize very well. I feel like I’m putting a whole lot on just to get my arms. It could just be my skin type, and the dryer weather, but I’ve been very dry skinned since I’ve started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Girl

customer_reviews.title: barely effective
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s expired or something. I used it 3-4 times a week for one month in 2 different tanning bed models and I’m only 1 makeup shade darker. I’ve never had this problem before with any other tanning lotions. (And no, I don’t use lotions with bronzer in them.)
customer_reviews.author: Teal Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some of the other reviewers I wasn't very worried about whether or not I thought the name brand was legit. I was just looking for a good tanning lotion that was affordable. This one had high reviews so I decided to give it a try. I love the smell to this one and really feel like it moisturizes my skin and feels nice. I'd probably been tanning for a month before I got this lotion, and although I was getting some good color, I did notice an increase once I started using this lotion. I have more people comment on how tan I'm getting. I'd purchase again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Payne

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am always very skeptical with tanning lotions since a lot of them have either caused streaks or turned me orange. I tan fairly easily but I hate using bronzer because of the orange tint. After one tanning session, I noticed a big difference in my color and the color was even throughout. I have very sensitive skin, and this did not let me down. It is super moisturizing, and my skin was extremely soft hours after using it. I am not a fan of coconut smells, but this smelled really good! Just a little goes quite a ways so the bottle will last me quite some time. I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryll Luna

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Did they change the formula? I used to love this lotion, the scent was so good! This is my second bottle and it’s not as fragrant as the first one. It’s not bad, but not amazing anymore. Probably won’t purchase again. ( and I have loved every Ed hardy lotion I have used)
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Frickin Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This bronzer tan lotion is frickin amazing! Sunday it arrived, Monday was perfect weather for basking in the sun. Just in one lotioning season I could tell a big difference. I did 30min on each side, turning every 15min.
customer_reviews.author: Zabe_party7

customer_reviews.title: Smells good! Very creamy and you get your money's worth
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I was just pretty tan before or if the product really does work really well, but I do like it. I used the Love Boho before but after a few weeks I wan't noticing much difference in my color. I have been using this product for about a week now and I seem to be getting darker, so that's a plus. It smells just like coconuts or like any coconut lotion you would buy from the store. I also like that when you are done tanning, you don't have that burnt skin smell. I would recommend it for the price! Think it works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Slow nice light tan
customer_reviews.text: This is good and gets you tan like a light tan you get from outdoors. But I like solidx50 more because it makes me darker in one session. I like being super tan and dark as possible in shorter amount of time so this one isn’t the one for me. I still use it if I run out of the one I normally use. But the tan is too slow and light for me
customer_reviews.author: Keela

customer_reviews.title: Smells like play dough
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on a good tanning lotion and this is was my result. The lid cracked in half... it smells like PLAY-DOUGH!! I can handle products that don’t smell great cause let’s be honest the tanning beds don’t smell great either but this lotion makes me gag. Was really looking forward to this considering it said it’s also help tattoos from fading in the bed but i can’t deal with the smell. After I tan i have to run home to shower cause the play dough smell gets stronger once you’re done tanning...
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Authentic product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I'm not into the accelerators with the bronzer or tingle. Has a nice lite coconut scent that's not overwhelming. As other reviewers have said, the product is real. Just check out the Ed Hardy website. Always a good idea to do your research before giving your review.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My skin has never felt so soft. The Accelerator in the lotion is awesome. Providing quick results with out the brunt smell. For me I have considered this to be my everyday lotion regardless of whether I'm going to the tanning salon or not.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: This has NO SPF!
customer_reviews.text: So I am probably just an idiot, but when I read tanning lotion I assumed it had some spf in it. Turns out it doesn't. I spent 5 hrs in the sun on the river and came back so burnt. I was in pain for the next few days and my skin is still peeling. I know this is my own fault, but I do not want the same thing to happen to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this about a week to lay out an hour a day and I have noticeable tan lines. It also doesn’t make me feel sticky or gooey. You can hardly notice you have anything on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bateman

customer_reviews.title: No tanning at all.....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this self tanner 3 days in a row and didn’t get as much as a hint of a tan! Very disappointed!!! All this is, is a lightly colored moisturizer. Don’t bother buying! I own my own beauty salon and do spray tanning, so I’m always looking for a good self tanner to recommend to clients that don’t have a tacky residue. This one doesn’t, but it also doesn’t give a tan either! Too bad I already recommended it to a few clients before I tried it just from the reviews! Won’t do that again!!!
customer_reviews.author: CLDavid

customer_reviews.title: Nock Off!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product thinking that it was the "Ed Hardy Coconut Kisses", but it is not! The first thing that I noticed was that it had a a weird smell to it. Upon examining the bottle, I then noticed that the symbol that is above the Coconut word is not the same symbol that it shows in the picture which is the EH for Ed Hardy. The symbol on the bottle that I recieved is a palm tree. If there was a way to give a negative star review, I would have rated this a - 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LaurynSpears

customer_reviews.title: Top blows off but really good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I'm not giving this a 5 is because every bottle I've gotten at some point when squeezing it out the top blows off and i got lotion galore. It's a defect or something. The lotion is my favorite. I wear it as a lotion somedays and when i go to pool outside to lay out or in tanning bed. Love the smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I expected this lotion to proceed my current tan but it has not. I ended up not using it anymore because I needed something more advanced. The smell is great as well as moisturizer but I recommend this for beginners not advanced tanners. I own my own tanning bed and tan almost everyday, every other day for sure so I am always looking for the next best platou breaker!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the try!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It doesn't make you dark right away. It actually helps you build a tan that goes with your skin tone. I get tons of compliments on how nice my tan is. I'm a paler person and this is my 2nd bottle been tanning since march 15th. I love this. The scent isn't strong at all. I actually wish it was stronger. But it's like a lotion and tanner. I love it. I've recommended several people to this lotion and so far none of them have been disappointed. It really does adjust to your skin color of tanning.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tattoos
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to tanning so take my review with a grain of salt. That being said, I've been really happy with this lotion. I love the smell, but most importantly it keeps my tattoos nice and vibrant through the tan. If you have tattoos I highly recommend using this lotion!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lotion for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lotion it has a nice scent I don't smell like burnt skin after tanning. After two tanning sessions I could see a difference in my tan getting darker. It left my skin smooth and it rubbed in well. As for the lotion being fake or real I don't know because I've only purchased it off Amazon. All I can say is that I like it and I have had good results with in. For the price is definitely worth giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Do not put it on your face your been warned
customer_reviews.text: I have been tanning for the past 2 months got this because they don’t sell what I used to use anymore. DO NOT PUT IT ON YOUR FACE! I don’t have sensitive skin never have but when I tell you I have over hundred little bumps on my forehead after putting it on my face 1 time. SERIOUSLY do not put it on your face. Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Creativethinker

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer! Not enough toner...
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin, and I usually burn before tanning. I thought I would try this out. First things first. Not fake. Secondly... It smells great, moisturizes wonderfully! Lastly, I used it 3x in a week. Extremely subtle difference for me. Natural change. For the amount used, and the impact, I will not be buying this again. I will finish off the bottle and give an updated review.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Honore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product doesn’t stink like most lotions do after tanning
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product doesn’t stink like most lotions do after tanning, I was laying in the bed for a month using nothing and my skin was getting really dry with not much change in my skin tone, this lotion has made my skin super soft and I started noticing results in two weeks, now that’s with me laying 4 Days a week. It’s a lite bronze so I don’t have issues with the creases of my fingers and toes turning orange or brown I will be a customer for life!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this tanner a few months ago. It has a nice scent and gives you a light sun kiss tone. The small isn't as strong or harsh smelling as other lotions.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanning lotion. And for the ones leaving comments saying this isn't the real brand, that's not true. They changed up their design a bit on the bottle. So they have the tree on it now instead of the Ed hardy logo. If you go on the actual Ed hardy website, it even shows this lotion with the same logo. It's the real stuff. Smells really good and also helps fade away cellulite.
customer_reviews.author: Tori M

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it was the last time I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time ordering this lotion and the last two were really good. They smelled really good and moisturized very well. I was using it almost every day. This last bottle I ordered isn't as good. I think this bottle smells kinda like play dough and it doesn't feel as moisturizing on my skin. Maby i just got a bad batch cause its usually good when I get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Tanning Lotion! Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels on my skin!! Goes on very smoothly, no sticky or stinky residue! No orange hands!! And it smells great! Only thing I would change about it would be quicker results but I bet if you buy the coconut kisses black label it will give the faster results!! I just didn’t realize that until after I ordered. This lotion is so nice I could use it as a daily lotion. It’s lovely!! You also get plenty for the amount your spending. Bottle is a decent size and full!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Causes terrible itch and sun poisoning
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this zero stars. I’ve been using it for a month and have barely gotten any color. I normally tan really easily so this was confusing to me. I also got terribly burnt. My feet, my back, my chest and my arms developed a unbearable itch that kept me up at night. Also got a rash on my heels that itches like crazy and as soon as I switched to a lotion I bought from the tanning salon this all went away. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Russell A.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not a good lotion. Lesson learned you get what you pay for. Has no smell either. No where on my bottle does it say Ed Hardy either. Probably should’ve read reviews before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works the first time!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I usually use one and done natural bronzer but it stopped working for me and this worked first time, i used a sticker to test. It smells decent too, doesnt smell "burnt" afterwards. Also...zero streaking or orange! Im not sure about some of the comments in regards to being authentic...my bottle was in english and it works so im going with yes its authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Wild

customer_reviews.title: Good value for tanning bed lotion
customer_reviews.text: I believe this lotion is rated as an Amazon Choice. I bought my first bottle because of that rating as well as the price. Was not disappointed. This is my second bottle. I'm not a fan of bronzers and I get a nice tan with it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this tanning lotion!! It smells great!! It leaves your skin feeling like pure silk!! It drys really quickly and isnt at all messy or leaves any streaks!! It is a great price and very high quality. Its gives you a beautiful golden tan!! Doesnt have a bad after tan smell at all. Im very pale and after just a few visits I could tell a difference. It doesnt give you a orange look its actually a deep golden tan that is absolutly beautiful. I will defenitly be buying this again!! Im soooo in love with this lotion!!! I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion
customer_reviews.text: This tanning lotion is the best 👌 it protects all my tattoos and gives me an awesome tan. The first time I used this I put it on my legs and was outside all day and I was red from thigh to feet. When I got up the next morning I was brown😁
customer_reviews.author: lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and am so happy! I have very sensitive skin and can’t use bronzing or tingling lotions because I break out in the tanning bed. So far, I’ve had no break outs and can definitely tell I have more color by the second time using this lotion. Goes on light and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I got a bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is so nice to put on, and I love the fragrance. I was miserable to see it gave me bumpy rash. I wish I would've just gone to Ulta or Sephora to get a tanning lotion because I don't think I can get refunded in Amazon for this. In those other stores they accept returns if you break out. It wasn't the product's fault I reacted badly.
customer_reviews.author: Melian

customer_reviews.title: Lotion is lotion
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t seem to live up to any standards other than lotion. Not much of a darker tan than without so far. It doesn’t compare to the lotion of a designer skin bottle, but you’re not paying for it either. I bought this with the intent of thinking, ‘well, lotion is lotion’. But I do wish I would’ve spent a little more and found legit one. The after smell is gross. It should honestly probably come down to $10-12.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t tried it for tanning... yet.
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice, I didn’t break out! It was light and made my skin soft. Cool enough for 106 degree heat index almost every day! I’m going to try this in a stand up tanning bed and probably outside too. Thank you Ed Hardy for this Gem!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: works fast!
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 applications and only a few hours in the sun, I have my mid-Summer glow, but it's only Spring! I also have sensitive skin and this product did not irritate at all. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: your skin does feel nice after using it
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, your skin does feel nice after using it. Unfortunately I bought a tanning lotion though - not a moisturizer. This actually would be a great moisturizer but that was not my intention when I bought it. It does not do anything to help me with tanning and the after tan smell is not great. As a note I have fair skin so maybe it works better for others but I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CTMom814

customer_reviews.title: Nice noticeable tan first time trying this product.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on buying this product. I usually only purchase product from my salon. Nice smell. My first tanning with this product was noticeable! I am a regular salon tanner. Always changing products. I am glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: October Breeze

customer_reviews.title: May have caused a rash/hives..... Love the smell tho
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this product. It is very light weight, not heavy. However, I only used this once so far and I think the lotion gave me hives!! I'm not sure if it was from this product, but after reading other reviews I'm concerned. Not even sure if I'll try it a second time, which is a bummer. I'd recommend a different lotion tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L

customer_reviews.title: ... this because if the mixed reviews but I am glad I took a chance and bought it
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy this because if the mixed reviews but I am glad I took a chance and bought it. I love the smell and the feel of the lotion. I didn't have to run home after tanning and shower because the smell was horrible after (like some I have used) I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend this lotion
customer_reviews.text: Horrible lotion for me and my husband. It dried our skin out and did not help with getting a tan. The tanning salon called and said that we can’t use this lotion anymore bc it’s leaving a heavy residue on their beds that is difficult to clean after use. Smells good tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks after you tan
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stinks. After you tan it smells horrible. I have purchased other Ed hardy lotions and they don’t stink like this one does . Idk if I got a knockoff but if this is legit then be warned it stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Fake!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like my first two bottles bought a t salon and my first purchase from Amazon! The smell and color are way off! I compared to a friend bottle bought from salon this year and I'm left feeling so ripped off! I hope to get my money back as I feel I wasted it on this. Granted the real stuff works wonderfully! I just think I got a bottle of regular lotion with some color whipped in! Almost smells like play-dough! Be cautious y'all... The more I buy on line from third party sellers the more I've realized I get ripped off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tanning Lotion without the Bronzing
customer_reviews.text: I had the hardest time trying to find a great hydrating tanning lotion that didn't have some kind of bronzer. This works great. I get a bit tired of the coconut smell, it's a bit strong, but doesn't smell bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Scent is not great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend, and she does not like the scent of this lotion. Overall this is a good tanning lotion but the scent could be better. And compared to other lotions it is kind of expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Husnain

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, performs good. Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, smalls great, getting excellent results. This stuff is the real deal. Others have said it is fake - it is NOT. Same product as my salon sells, only not as expensive. Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket0455

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad, did about as well in the tanning bed as putting on regular lotion. Then when it heats up, it smells even worse. Can’t even try again because the smell made me nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Light scent, heavy moisture, perfect bronzing without brown lotion
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very light and not overpowering, yet it hides that nasty post-tanning bed skin smell. It must have bronzer since I appear darker immediately after tanning, but the lotion is white. The bottle is very nicely designed, making this an overall nice experience.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Carter

customer_reviews.title: NOT ED HARDY-FAKE ITEM
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t even the advertised item!! What I got looks different and mentions NOWHERE that it’s Ed Hardy. This item is a complete scam and I feel ripped off...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion! It is super moisturizing, silky, and it smells really good!! It doesn't have that burnt skin-coconut scent after you tan!! Used it one time, and definitely got some amazing color!
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite by far. This is my first time using this product. I have tried lotions from really expensive to really cheap. Scent is amazing. I do not notice that after tan burn smell
customer_reviews.author: BTran

customer_reviews.title: Burned while tanning
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a super light person I don’t recommend. I started using a tanning bed to get some color. I used this for a week and my skin is burning. Im tanning very little in the bed to avoid burns. This tanning lotion doesn’t help what so ever. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I decided to order this product. I did receive the Ed hardy brand bottle- however, the scent changes within minutes of applying. It smells like burnt rubber! Also, it made my skin oily. I do not recommend this indoor tanning bed lotion!!
customer_reviews.author: lewis

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Waste of money stick to the real brand.
customer_reviews.text: So I gave this a chance, I used the entire bottle till it was completely gone and you couldn’t even tell I was using anything at all not even noticeable. This does not even compare to the real stuff. I will be sticking with paint it black. The real brand works great but little pricey so gave this a chance and wasted money and I tan very easy so this was very disappointing! Will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Creech

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color I get with this lotion! I have been amazed at the color I have achieved with this lotion. Also my tan seems to stay longer. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Ibises this product for 2 weeks while tanning at the salon. I put it one 15 minutes before leaving my house so it would soak in. I didn’t get much color from it at all. Very disappointed. I’ve used this product before when I bought it from the salon and had very different results. I think it is a knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Janalee

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works great with no bronzers
customer_reviews.text: This lotion smells amazing before and after tanning. It's a thick lotion that spreads pretty well. This lotion does not have bronzers in it but I had noticible results the first time I used this lotion. I did have a base tan before using it so I'm not sure what kind of results you would get I using this to get a base tan started. I will be buying this lotion again.
customer_reviews.author: kim early

customer_reviews.title: LOVE It. Smells lovely and gave me a good tan.
customer_reviews.text: I truly do like it. It gave me a beautiful glow after being in the sun for an hour. 30 front and 30 back.
customer_reviews.author: Trici Trills

customer_reviews.title: The best. Quickest tan. No mess. no burn. no fuss
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once so far and my skin has already darkened about a shade and a half. I have fair skin and went in the tanning bed for the maximum amount of time and didn't burn, I wear white afterwards and no Mark's on them. Definitely buying again
customer_reviews.author: Troy Douglas

customer_reviews.title: This is not Ed Hardy
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package and have not officially use the product yet but my first note is that this is not Ed Hardy. There is no mention of Ed Hardy on the packaging. And the logo on the front is different than pictured in the product description on Amazon. The price is great if the product works. I will update this review after an ample period of use.
customer_reviews.author: Marah B

customer_reviews.title: Super tan and smells amaaazing
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same as the salon! It's priced $75 there which is ridiculous as we all know. I didn't intend to even find it here on Amazon but when I did, I grabbed it right away!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonianRay

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Guess it all depends who the seller is on Amazon....my tanning lotion was legit worked very well .. great price fast shipping.. purchased from "Smart Destinations,". thanks. $18 ...back up to $30😯
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Watery, odd smell, no tan!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on reviews. Some said it smelled good others not so much. I am going to side with the not so much group. This lotion has done nothing for me and it has a funky smell. The lotion is thin (watery), smells odd, and has given me no results.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: Nice lotion, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, absorbs quickly and doesn't stain your clothes. I dont think its for deep, dark tans but it does help to quickly get a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: DM3

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the Ed Hardy coconut tanning lotion before and loved it. I didnt like this one though. It did NOT do anything for my skin in the tanning bed, but the smell was decent! It's a cheap tanning loton if that's what you're looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Good option for budget conscious indoor tanners
customer_reviews.text: Smell is a little on the sweet side, but definitely coconut and not chemical like some tanning lotions. I am fair and tend to have dry skin. For me, it goes on smoothly with no streaking or orange tint and leaves skin moisturized. Doesn't seem to accelerate tanning, but worth it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I tried this because of reviews and price rather cheap for a good tanning lotion I have also tried the maui babe and the new fox tan everyone is raving about n I must say THIS IS MY FAVORITE it gives me the beat results some of the reviews says it's a knock off n it might be idk but I also dont care lol it's the best product on the market and gives the best results will definitely be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Liz truesdale

customer_reviews.title: Cap broke so easily
customer_reviews.text: The smell is ok, it's not overbearing. It applied smoothly but I didn't see that great of a result. If you want a little tanning on your legs then this is fine. What bothered me is that a black piece in the cap was chipped. I didn't think much of it but after a week, it completely broke and the cap was useless. After tanning I've been having to put a papertowel around it and a rubber band. I am actually happy that it has almost ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not someone who easily tans, simply because I can’t handle heat very well. I started the tanning bed & the product I bought from the salon didn’t work well with my skin. I found this product and absolutely love it! It smells good & works well! I have been using it for almost 3 weeks now & I am definitely holding color in my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Ed Hardy false advertising
customer_reviews.text: Received today and Ed Hardy is no where on the bottle. Compared it to last bottle I ordered looks the same except last one had Ed Hardy on front and back this one didn’t. Address on bottle matched but email on bottle didn’t match. One had Ed Hardy email and this one was tan ovations. Won’t do this again unless someone can explain why. Not sure this is safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: T Dalton

product_meta.title: Ed Hardy Coconut Kisses Golden Tanning Lotion, 13.5 oz
product_meta.description: Sit back, relax, and let your skin escape to the tropics. Coconut kisses' lavish hydration will drench your skin in coconut milk & coconut oil for an extreme softening and skin hydrating effect, while the intoxicating fragrance will make you dream of a day in paradise. Tanning intensifiers deliver dark golden results without the use of bronzing agents. Quad tyrosine blend + melanobronze - stimulate and increase melanin formation to accelerate the tanning process. Melactiva - melanin synthesizer for darker, longer lasting results. Nouritan - stimulates tyrosine activity and promotes an even and long lasting tan. Body fit - reduces the appearance of cellulite and promotes firmness. Tattoo & colour fade protector - prolongs the life and radiance of your tattoos and tanning results. Coconut oil, coconut milk & cocoa butter - provide intense, deep skin hydration.
feature_bullets: Tattoo Fade Protecting Formula: Helps prolong the life and radiance of your tattoos and tanning results.
Quad Tyrosine Blend & Melano Bronze: Stimulates and increases melanin formation to accelerate the tanning process.
Ultra-Darkening Skin Hydrating Intensifier: Contains coconut milk, coconut oil, and cocoa butter to improve skin hydration. Delivers a dark golden tan without the use of bronzing agents.
Coconut Paradise Fragrance: An intoxicating light coconut fragrance with a faint scent of vanilla will make you dream of a day in paradise.
Ed Hardy tanning products are part of the Tanovations company. The Ed Hardy logo was replaced by the Tanovations logo, which has a palm tree.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
